statements: UPDATE AirQualityData SET value = 10.5, timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 'a1234567-1234-5678-9876-abcdef123456';
UPDATE AirQualityData SET location = 'New York City', value = 15.3 WHERE pollutant = 'PM2.5';
UPDATE AirQualityData SET value = 25.5, timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AirQualityData SET location = 'New York', pollutant = 'PM 2.5' WHERE id = '543e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AirQualityData SET location = 'New York' WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE PollutionControlMeasures SET description = 'Install air filters' WHERE measure_id = 2;
UPDATE AirQualityData SET pollution_level = 5 WHERE sensor_id = 101;
UPDATE PollutionControlMeasures SET description = 'New measure implemented' WHERE measure_id = 202;
UPDATE AirQualityData SET pm25 = 15.6 WHERE location = 'City A'
UPDATE PollutionControlMeasures SET measure_description = 'Implementing new technology to reduce emissions' WHERE measure_id = 3
UPDATE AirQualityData SET pm25 = 15.6, pm10 = 30.2 WHERE timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00' AND location = 'New York';
UPDATE PollutionControlMeasures SET measure_description = 'Implemented new air filtration system' WHERE measure_name = 'Air Filtration System';
UPDATE air_quality_data SET reading = 10.5, location = 'Park' WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE sensor_calibration SET calibration_factor = 1.2, calibration_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE sensor_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE air_quality_data SET reading = 15.6, location = 'Park Plaza' WHERE sensor_id = '9dee31e3-51cb-4a83-a267-0ec70acbce7f';

UPDATE devices SET installation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE air_quality_measurements SET pm25_level = 20, pm10_level = 15 WHERE sensor_id = 3;
UPDATE devices SET device_name = 'SensorHub 3000', installation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE air_quality_measurements SET pm25_level = 25, pm10_level = 15 WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND measurement_date >= '2022-09-01';
